message: Hi Bob, I'm interested in selling this product to you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a valuable item at a fair price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Hi Alice, $180 is a bit too high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I can only go up to $80. Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I understand that $180 is a bit steep for you, but I'm not willing to go as low as $80. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $120.
